description: Research paper format report (introduction, materials/methods, results, discussion) based on practical program research project. Up to 2500 words with 6 figures/tables. Draft feedback in Week 9, final submission via Turnitin in Week 10.
2-hour exam assessing lecture content from Weeks 4-10 during formal exam period. Short essay format questions.
1-hour test during Week 5 lab time assessing lecture content from Weeks 1-3. Short essay format. Supplementary tests require special consideration.

Combined assessment with 3 online lab quizzes (16%) testing practical program knowledge (multiple attempts allowed) and a 4% diagnostic report analyzing a simulated clinical sample. Feedback provided during classes.
